text: #Cancer ~ Was Disabled when diagnosed ~ Lost Sister to Ovarian 🕊 I refused to Treat we were poor ~ I waited to die ~ Heard about #Cannabis and #Cancer 2011 ~ Patented 1973 or 4 then moved to DEA Schedule 1 ~ 1988 #Endocannabinoid System discovered 30 yrs ago #JimCrow #oilandgas https://t.co/buMwfL4cBt
